sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Grid, Card, Image, Reveal, Placeholder } from 'semantic-ui-react'

const ChampionCard = (props) => {
  return(
      <Card color='teal'>
        <Reveal animated='fade'>
          <Reveal.Content visible>
            <Card.Content>
              <Image size='medium' src={props.champion.icon_image} />
            </Card.Content>
          </Reveal.Content>
          <Reveal.Content hidden>
            <Card.Content>
              <Placeholder>
                <Placeholder.Image size='large' square />
              </Placeholder>
            </Card.Content>
          </Reveal.Content>
        </Reveal>
        <Card.Content
        style={{color: 'black', fontWeight: 'bold'}}
        >
          {`${props.champion.name}, ${props.champion.title}`}
        </Card.Content>
      </Card>
  )
}

export default ChampionCard
